item.title: Demetriou’s departure imminent - The Australian
item.description:
Demetriou’s departure imminent  The Australian

Brisbane have announced the retention of Matt Lodge on a two-year-deal and stepped up talks to farewell assistant coach Jason Demetriou. Lodge was offered substantial money to leave the Broncos but a sense of loyalty to the club that helped him revive his career convinced him to stay. Reports of a mass exodus in the wake of Wayne Bennett’s departure are proving unfounded, unless the speculation is extended to include coaching staff, as assistant coach Jason Demetriou steps up talks over his exit. The players are going nowhere. Lodge yesterday confirmed he would remain at the Broncos for a f...

item.title: Dylan Walker stood down by Manly following arrest for assault charges - The Guardian
item.description:
Dylan Walker stood down by Manly following arrest for assault charges  The Guardian

Manly NRL star Dylan Walker has been stood down from training after being charged with assault following an alleged domestic violence incident involving his partner on Sydney’s Northern Beaches. The woman, 24, suffered minor cuts to her shoulder, leg and feet at a home in Dee Why, on Thursday afternoon and was treated by paramedics at the scene. Related: Wayne Bennett 'happy to be sacked' by Brisbane Broncos Walker, also 24, was later arrested and charged with common assault and assault occasioning actual bodily harm. The Sea Eagles centre was driven away from Manly Police Station by coach ...
